item.name: Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs Committee

item.title: To redesignate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 7401 West 100th Place in Bridgeview, Illinois, as the "Michael J. Healy Post Office Building".

item.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S9740)
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 149.

item.name: Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs Committee

item.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4436)
For further action, see H.R. 825, which became Public Law 108-46 on 7/14/2003.

summary.text: Redesignates the facility of the U.S. Postal Service located at 7401 West 100th Place in Bridgeview, Illinois, as the Michael J. Healy Post Office Building.

(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)

Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility (the Moraine Valley Post Office) located at 7401 West 100th Place in Bridgeview, Illinois, as the Michael J. Healy Post Office Building.

bill.title: A bill to redesignate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 7401 West 100th Place in Bridgeview, Illinois, as the "Michael J. Healy Post Office Building".

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
